subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Bill Polian, the former N.F.L. executive, says the fallout from the Saints’ bounty scandal has strained the franchise and put the heaviest burden on quarterback Drew Brees.
snippet: Bill Polian, the former N.F.L. executive, says the fallout from the Saints’ bounty scandal has strained the franchise and put the heaviest burden on quarterback Drew Brees.
